channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Customer Area
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Customer Area

item.title: CVE-2022-4745|2024-08-03T01:48:40.413Z -- unknown -- wp%20customer%20area
item.description: The WP Customer Area WordPress plugin before 8.1.4 does not have CSRF checks when performing some actions such as chmod, mkdir and copy, which could allow attackers to make a logged-in admin perform them and create arbitrary folders, copy file for example.
